content: Drink your way towards Christmas by revealing a new brew each day of the season. The Beer Advent Calendar is stocked with twelve highly rated craft beers delivered to your doorstep. Forget the chocolate, give them what they really want… beer!

Let your imagination run wild by expressing yourself in color using this giant lite-brite. This ginormous toy can be used to create eye-catching technicolor works of art or can also be used to play entertaining games with your house mates or coworkers.

Take the trendiest dump in the world by dropping off the Brown’s at the Superbowl on this Louis Vuitton toilet. Every inch – except for the interior of the toilet bowl – of this gold colored Loo-uis Vuitton toilet comes decked out in the classic monogram leather.

This infinity scarf is a must have fashion accessory for Harry Potter fans and muggles alike. This four season infinity loop scarf can be worn around the neck in one long circle or wrapped twice – perfect for any style!

Help keep your cooking area clutter-free during your next feast by using this 5-in-1 BBQ grilling multi-tool. This over-sized Swiss Army knife is outfitted with a marinade brush, a fork, a corkscrew, a bottle opener, and a removable spatula.

Need the perfect gift for your favorite fisherman? Check out Mystery Tackle Box. Every month they’ll receive a curated box of tackle unique to their fishing style! Use code GIVEMTB for 5% off all gift certificates.

These Podtime sleep pods are the perfect place to recharge your batteries when you can’t make it home for a nap. Each pod features a cylindrical design with fold out doors located at the end for easy access, along with a comfy mattress and a surprisingly spacious interior.

Satiate your inner carnivore by snacking on this exotic meats crate. When cows and chickens just won’t cut it, this crate will satisfy your most primal hunger urges with mouth-watering snacks like pheasant, elk, buffalo, and alligator jerky.

Save your money like a true Pokemon master by storing it in this Pikachu coin stealing piggy bank. At the press of a button, an adorable little talking and giggling Pikachu will pop his head out from the red box and quickly grabs the coin that’s laid out in front of him.

Blissfully knead clumps of MicroMagnets to form abstract shapes and release your stress, or craft 3D sculptures from geometric shapes. You won’t be able to keep your fingers off these tiny addictive magnets! The included construction guide helps you get started.

Judging by the look of these mechanical exoskeleton suits, humanity will soon be ready for battle on Pandora. The suit requires no batteries or motors – it mimics your movements using a mechanical master-slave system that is capable of performing dynamic movements.

This Yamaha Niken 3 wheel motorcycle is sure to turn heads when it makes its big debut on the road. Powered by a liquid-cooled inline 3-cylinder engine, it features Leaning Multi-Wheeler technology that help stabilize the bike while cornering winding roads.

Treat your palate to the exotic flavors of distant lands from the comfort of home by signing up to receive snacks from around the world with MunchPak. You’ll receive a monthly package delivered to your doorstep with some of the best snacks from around the globe.

No barbecue, tailgate, birthday party, bar mitzvah, or wake ceremony would be complete without this glorious ranch dressing fountain. This gift from the gods features four cascading tiers that easily accommodate twelve standard size bottles of creamy ranch dressing.

The newly unveiled Tesla Roadster proves that you don’t need to be reliant on fossil fuels to go ludicrously fast. This second generation Roadster seats four, has a range of 600 miles, does 0-60 in just 1.9 seconds and will be able to exceed speeds of 250 mph.

Give stress a swift kick in the ass with a hot cup of some “Calm The Fuck Down” tea. This soothing herbal tea blend includes licorice and chamomile that combine to produce a delightfully tasting drink that will melt away your stress.

Why enjoy a yacht for only a short period of time when you can enjoy it 365 days a year on the Arkup Livable Yacht. This lavish self-sustaining 4 bed / 4.5 bath home can withstand category 4 hurricanes and comes with hydraulic lifts that keep it raised above the sea level.

Chevrolet is breaking ground into the supercar class with the introduction of the 2019 Corvette ZR1. This performance-tuned speed demon boasts a 755 horse power supercharged small block 6.2-liter V8 engine with 715 foot-pounds of torque.

Decorate your beautiful tree like a true alcoholic by hanging these whiskey filled Christmas tree ornaments. The set comes with six little plastic baubles that are each filled with 1.7 fl. oz. of “The One” by Lake Distillery – made using whiskey from all over the British Isles.

There’s no better way to ensure your valuables remain secure than by storing them inside the Colosimo 300SL Gullwing personal vault. Inspired by the classic 1954 Mercedes Benz 300SL, this stainless steel safe features an exquisite design and 3-digit combination lock.

Take your mobile gaming to new heights by upgrading to the Razer gaming smartphone. It features a clean minimalist design and boasts specs like a Qualcomm Snapdragon 835, 8GB of RAM, and a 5.72 inch Sharp IGZO LCD screen with 1440 x 2560 resolution.

A Turkish R&D startup company has made every geek’s dream a reality by constructing a real life functional transformer car. Using a wireless remote, this 3-series BMW goes from vehicle to giant Autobot capable of moving its arms, hands, and even speaking.

Turn your would-be nightmare of a long flight into total paradise by upgrading your coach seat to an airborne hotel room. Singapore Airlines’ Airbus A380 features six ultra luxurious private cabins equipped with everything from a comfy bed to a 32″ touchscreen television.

Make sleeping with the fishes something to get excited about by booking your stay at this shark aquarium underwater bedroom through Airbnb. You’ll get to spend the night completely submerged in a 3 million liter aquarium, surrounded by 35 majestic sharks.

Maximize your off-road fun by upgrading to this leaning suspension ATV. The Wesll Leaning Suspension Quad features a custom chassis and suspension that leans and tilts based on your movements and the terrain, for a smooth ride over bumpy ground.

Escape everyday life and travel into a world of wonder by putting on the Lenovo Explorer mixed reality headset. It features inside-out tracking that delivers precise movement fidelity along with spacial audio that lets you hear sounds from specific locations, just like in real life.

Practice anytime and anywhere with the Jammy super portable digital guitar. The slim body of this ultra portable instrument comes with a short neck with 5 frets that can be extended up to 12 inches in order to change octaves and get the full range of a guitar.

Increase the difficulty and fun factor of your next climbing session by trying some augmented rock climbing. This supercharged version employs body tracking and projected graphics to create interactive games designed to motivate and improve your skills.

This 360 degree spin drifting go-kart proves that you’re never too old to get behind the wheel of a go-kart. This little beast features a comfy bucket seat, a 12-volt rechargeable battery, and comes with a 500-watt chain-driven motor that lets you reach speeds of 17 mph.

Traverse Mother Nature’s most rugged terrain in utmost comfort riding atop this 8×8 amphibious ATV. It’s equipped with a 30 hp Kohler 748 cc EFI engine and a soft-ride system with ultra-low pressure tires for a smooth ride on bumpy terrain.

This stunning floating cloud speaker creates an eye-catching focal point while filling the room with pleasant sound. Each speaker is individually hand fluffed in the form of a puffy cumulus cloud and is fitted with sound reactive LEDs that light up when the music plays.

Put your Thor costume over-the-top by arming yourself with this giant Thor’s hammer prop. This enormous prop measures almost four feet tall and accurately depicts the Thunder God’s trusty weapon Mjolnir – as seen in the Marvel movies.

Keep your dress shoes looking like new with help from this shoe shine box kit. Everything you need to achieve a professional quality shine right at home comes neatly organized inside an elegant wooden case – complete with a latch and a small platform to rest your shoe on.

Strike fear into the heart of any enemy with this real human tibia bone sword. This gorgeous but deadly 46 inch long weapon comes with a razor sharp battle ready 4.7 mm thick blade that is complemented by a masterfully carved tibia bone hilt.

Experience a watery thrill unlike anything you’ve ever encountered before by hopping on the Ferris Wheel water slide. It’s made up of a series of entangled tubes that spin at 3 rotations per minute – sending you down the inner-tube at speeds up to 25 mph.

Become the undisputed king of the tailgate by showing up with this ultimate tailgate trailer in tow. Every inch of this tricked out trailer comes packed with everything you could possible need – such as an LED HDTV and home theater system, a grill, and even a private bathroom.

Turn your living room into the funnest part of your home by bringing in this cornhole board coffee table. The legs of this superbly crafted solid and veneer ash wood table are designed to fold inward so that you can easily play a game of cornhole whenever the mood strikes.

Maximize any bedroom’s limited space with these transforming wall beds. This twin size bunk bed features a functional Murphy bed inspired design that allows you to conveniently fold the beds into the wall when they’re not in use.

The 72 Hour Cabin is a one room cabin that was built as part of a case study to test whether being close to nature can significantly lower your stress levels. After 72 hours inside this cozy cabin, the participants all showed a decrease in blood pressure, heart rate, and stress.

titleEN: A New Hope Title Crawl Floor Runner
content: Tie your room together with some geeky flair by laying out this “A New Hope” title crawl floor runner. This officially-licensed piece displays the exact opening crawl text that appears at the start of the iconic Episode IV film.

Turn your dining room into your home’s go-to hangout spot with this 2-in-1 billiards and dining table. This gorgeous 8-foot pool and dining table is expertly crafted from Douglas fir and topped off with a weathered oak finish that’ll really make your dining room stand out.

Make your favorite handyman’s day by surprising him with the ultimate drill bit set. The set comes neatly organized in a properly labeled portable case that holds 300 different types of drill bits – ranging from masonry drill bits to wood boring drill bits.

Give your room a little Nintendo flair with some accent lighting from this Mario Chain Chomp lamp. This whimsical task lamp comes designed exactly like a Chain Chomp – complete with a swiveling head that you can pivot so the light is always at the perfect angle.

Become the undisputed king of the road by zooming past everyone inside the Hennessey Venom F5. Under the aerodynamic carbon-fiber body lies a V8 twin turbo 1,600 horsepower engine capable of going from 0-187 mph in just 10 seconds.

Bring your plain walls to life with the LIFX tile lighting kit. Each 8″ x 8″ tile is controlled independently, connects to your home’s Wi-Fi without a hub, and displays a series of incredible light art, patterns, and cool effects that will transform any part of your home with bursts of color.

Become a legend by wielding one of these mighty sword shaped keys. They’re available in a variety of iconic sword styles such as The Keyblade, Master Sword, Kylo Ren’s Lightsaber, Anduril, and Sting from Lord Of The Rings.

Make your overpriced micro studio feel a little more spacious by maximizing your limited living area with this DIY loft kit. Perfect for small apartments with tall ceilings, this sturdy structure adds a small second level that you can access via a staircase.

Immerse yourself in the digital action like never before by playing on this virtual reality gaming treadmill. While you’re on the platform, the treadmill tracks your every movement so that you can walk, run, crouch, and jump in real time.

Feel like you’re smoking out of a fancy science museum exhibit the next time you spark up using this plasma glass bong. The removable banger hanger mini tube rests on a glass base that transforms the entire structure into a touch-reactive plasma-sphere bong.

Shoot for the stars and fulfill your dreams of living the carnie lifestyle by purchasing your very own Gravitron carnival ride. Once you’re up and running you’ll begin raking in the dough by the bucket load while dining on gourmet corn dogs and candy apples every night.

Why waste your day off doing stuff outside when you can simply plop yourself down on this giant faux chinchilla beanbag and relax all day long? This massive bean bag measures six feet across and is covered by a faux fur so soft and comfy you’ll never want to get up.

Truth Bombs is the party game that pits you and your friends in an explosive battle of brutal honesty. You’ll be astounded at what comes out of your friend’s mouth as players take turns answering a series of funny and provocative questions.

With this self-sufficient expanding camper caravan you’ll be able to enjoy all the comforts of home when you decide to go off the grid. It folds out in just thirty seconds and is designed to be able to rotate so that you can follow the sun’s position to maximize power generation.

The Heesen Project Maximus yacht is the revolutionary new concept by noted designer Clifford Denn. This sleek 83-meter vessel combines features like arched sides and a forward located wheelhouse that allows the decks to run the entire length of this magnificent yacht.

Experience the true power of the Dark Side by incorporating these Star Wars kettlebells into your grueling workout. They’re cast in black iron and feature 3 sinister designs – a 50lb Boba Fett, a 60lb Stormtrooper, and a 70lb Darth Vader.

Honestly, if you can’t wrap a gift in scenes of chaos, what can you wrap it in? Featuring five lurid scenes of mayhem, “The Inappropriate Snowman” tells a tale of violence, drink, debauchery, and fantasy to horrify family and delight your twisted friends.

Limit your environmental impact while you stay hydrated by bringing along an edible water bottle. The design addresses the serious problem of water bottle pollution with edible water filled pouches made out of a strong and hygienic biodegradable material.

Airbnb is giving four lucky LEGO enthusiasts the chance of a lifetime to make their dreams come true by staying inside this life size LEGO house. Guests will get pro tips from a LEGO Master Builder and are allowed to explore and interact with every inch of this LEGO palace.

Flat tires will become a thing of the past once you outfit your ride with these tweel airless tires. This airless radial handles great on a broad range of surfaces and performs just as well as a pneumatic tire – without the risk of penetrations and impact damage.

Give your minor achievements more merit than they actually deserve by commemorating them with these demerit badges. These hilarious badges feature a convenient “peel and stick” adhesive backing so that you can place them virtually anywhere.

Easily traverse over any obstacle that stands in your way by getting behind the wheel of this Skyrunner flying ATV. It will reach speeds up to 70 mph on land, and can also quickly transform into a lightweight aircraft capable of reaching altitudes of 10,000 feet.

Own a piece of cinematographic history by adding Luke Skywalker’s authentic lightsaber to your geeky collection. This cast metal, brass, and rubber prop was one of the actual lightsabers used by Luke in the 1983 classic Return of the Jedi.

Take your living room’s “wow” factor up a notch by storing your literary collection in this 3D illusion Rubik’s cube bookcase. The deceptively simple design of this unique piece creates an awesome optical illusion that’ll add new dimension to your room.

The Colonel has teamed up with Village Vanguard to give a lucky few these KFC fried chicken bath bombs. These drumstick shaped bath bombs will keep you smelling as savory as a freshly cooked piece of fried chicken long after you exit the tub.

Pay homage to your favorite psychokinetic preteen by creating a little accent lighting with this Stranger Things bleeding nose candle. As the red wax of the candle begins to melt, it drips down Eleven’s ceramic nose to create the illusion she is about to tear some shit up.

Located on the Norwegian coastline, the Snøhetta underwater restaurant offers a dining experience like no other. The large dining area features an 11 x 4 meter panoramic acrylic window that treats guests to breath-taking underwater vistas while they enjoy their meals.

titleEN: My Love For You Is Like A Candle
content: Smother your significant other’s home with an intoxicating aroma that’ll make him think twice about leaving you. Perfect for the overly attached girlfriend, it features 3 delightfully scented layers that include burnt fig, cedar wood, and cassis at the base.

Learn the skills necessary to become a Jedi knight by signing up for these lightsaber fighting classes. Based on actual combat blade fighting, these interactive classes teach you the finer points of sword fighting so you can quickly advance from Padawan to Jedi master.

Say goodbye to the real world and deplete your bodily fluids in record time by slipping inside of this virtual reality sex suit. The suit covers you from head to toe and stimulates your body in such a way that you’ll no longer feel the need for actual human interaction ever again.

If you’ve ever wondered what a Microsoft phone that ran on its iconic Windows 95 platform would look like, then feast your eyes on this Microsoft Windows 95 smartphone. Designer Henrique Perticarati created an awesome concept of what this phone would look like.

The Le Whaf alcohol vaporizer lets you enjoy your favorite drinks and alcoholic beverages without any of the calories or nasty hangovers. This liquid vaporizer transforms any beverage that you pour into a flavorful cloud that you can sip using the provided straw.

Triton Submarines is teaming up with famed car brand Aston Martin to bring you a state-of-the-art submersible that combines luxury and power. This limited edition submersible features a futuristic 007-inspired design and can seat up to three very lucky passengers.

Give your ride a cool sci-fi feel by geeking it up with this Tron arcade joystick shifter. This pistol-grip shifter for manual transmissions was expertly created using an actual joystick from the classic TRON arcade game – making this perfect for hardcore gamers or TRON fans.

The fiddle stick is a fidget toy on steroids! Perfect for people of all ages, this unique toy can flip, spin, glide or slide. The completely modular base can also connect to a traditional fidget spinner for super cool moves using just one hand!

If programmers had an Iron Throne, it’d probably look something like this zero gravity workstation. This glorious setup includes a reclining chair and comes outfitted with everything from articulating tables to folding arms so that you can work in utmost comfort.

titleEN: NBA GAME TIME Basketball Arcade Game
content: Transform your rec room into a legitimate arcade with this NBA GAME TIME basketball game. It features cool sound effects that recreate the feel of a real court, a basketball themed ramp, and can be customized with 1 of 32 NBA team designs.

After conquering the silver screen, the One True God is ready to conquer your taste buds with the Nicolastick Nicolas Cage snack. This novelty puffed corn treat was given to Japanese movie-goers who purchased tickets to the Cage blockbuster Army Of One.

Bring old school flair to your favorite game with the Mackenrow wooden ping pong table. This superbly crafted walnut table features luxury accents like brass inlay, a tasteful orange stripe, and a custom wooden framed net that sports a classic Dutch weave.

The Experience Tube is perfect for connecting one-on-one with your best bud. Simply stick your face into one end of the tube and all peripheral distractions are instantly eliminated – allowing you to give your undivided attention to the person in front of you.

Give your little prince the royal treatment by upgrading his bedroom with this Notte Fatata Castle bed. Really, why should your little prince sleep on a plain old mattress like a filthy peasant when he can slumber like royalty inside this expertly designed castle?

Put some lovely ladybits on display without making your living room look like some kind of perverted sex dungeon by using this vagina butterfly pillow. It features a cleverly deceptive design that disguises a bunch of pink vaginas like lovely little pink butterflies.

Become the living embodiment of your favorite mutant without spending a fortune on a fancy getup by arming yourself with these DIY Wolverine automatic claws. This kit comes with everything necessary to craft some fierce Wolverine inspired popsicle stick claws.

Start living a happy life by letting this “Optional Fucks” perpetual calendar handle all of your daily decision-making. It comes with a small area at the top for writing down your daily commitments and a large spinner on the bottom that helps you decide how little to care for them.

Blur the lines between fiction and reality for your little sci-fi geek with this ride-on robotic armor. Once your kid climbs on top of the non-slip platform, their torso is transformed into that of a futuristic robot that can emit cool sounds effects and travel at an impressive 1 mph.

Make your living room look like the entryway to the bottomless unknown by accenting it with the void rug. Scottish product designer Scott Jarvie’s creative design gives the illusion that there’s a massive black void in the middle of your living room floor.

Towering at a staggering 583 feet tall, the ArcelorMittal Orbit is designed to take you on an incredible ride with London’s scenic cityscape in the background. The trip down lasts 40 seconds and provides a thrilling 164 foot drop to finish off your terrifying experience.

Now you can commemorate the dearly departed by turning them into a beautiful keepsake. The ornament is made with a specialized process that suspends your loved ones cremated remains within a beautifully sculpted glass piece.

Feel like an all-powerful being by creating your own reality using this augmented reality sandbox. It pairs 3D visualization applications along with a small sandbox to help you quickly create topography models by shaping the sand with your hands.

Multiply the fun of your favorite indoor game by going up against your friends in this life size inflatable foosball arena. Ideal for parties, this fully inflatable arena features a goal post at either end and is large enough to host a full-on 5-on-5 game.

As if your smartphone didn’t already do enough for you, now it can also keep pesky mosquitoes away from your personal space. The LG K7i employs ulrasonic waves to repel those annoying little mosquitoes and keep them from biting you.

With the monthly wine club subscription box you’ll be able to taste the finest distilled grape juices from around the world without leaving your couch. Each month, you’ll receive a box with 4 wines from a selection that features over 100 varieties of wine.

Stay at the forefront of fashion by slaying the game with these nostril hair extensions. Because really, why waste your time highlighting your eyes or lips when you can instead highlight the sexiest feature in your entire body – your nose?!

titleEN: If You Had To Card Game
content: Really get to know your friends by seeing how they would act in utterly silly and embarrassing situations by playing the “If You Had To” card game. It comes with 250 game cards featuring horrible and hilarious scenarios that players must choose between.

Spend an entire day out on the water without incurring extreme sunburn by hopping aboard the tent raft. This ocean-ready raft is tough enough to handle up to class 4 rivers, comes with an attachable tent that shields you from the sun, and fully deflates for easy transport.

Bring arcade gaming into your home with these arcade machine coffee tables! Available in several styles, these arcade machine coffee tables feature a built in computer and nostalgic arcade buttons so that you can play all your favorite arcade-era games.

Double the chances of cracking your phone’s screen by swapping your archaic single-screen model for the ZTE Axon M foldable dual screen smartphone. It folds out to provide you with two side-by-side 6.75″ full HD screens that create an ultra portable tablet-like display.

Unleash hell on your coworkers by outfitting your cubicle with the mini toothpick crossbow. This extremely fun and potentially annoying weapon features a sturdy stainless steel frame, an ample chamber that can store extra rounds, and a firing range of over 80 feet.

Sleep with the fishes – literally – by booking a stay at the Sentosa Resort beach villas. Each of the exclusive two-story townhouse suites offers an ample living area on the top level – complete with an outdoor patio and Jacuzzi – and breathtaking underwater vistas below.

Lacunas Beach performance flip flops are made to glide through water and across sand without that bogged down feeling you get from standard flip flops. Each super light weight element moves independently to the other creating “traction control” shoes.

Never iron a shirt again! Now you can simply leave that boring chore to the automatic clothes ironing machine. You can hang up to 12 garments at a time and it comes with a user-friendly one button design that perfectly dries, steams, and irons your clothes in a short time.
